title: Narrative Distortion Override
description: Detects when media or political narratives are reshaped to overwrite actual context or facts, effectively erasing the original complexity of events.
indicators: Rapid pivot of media narratives to fit a predefined agenda rather than reported facts
Framing that erases or reverses the identity or motivations of individuals involved
Use of emotionally charged terms to delegitimize certain groups while protecting others
Patterns of memory rewriting or selective framing over time
